commit message:
Revert integration of MemorizingTrustManager

This opens up too many security issues.
More sensible error message on 404 when logging in
Add clause for SSL exceptions in login failure handling
Create new API object for LoginActivity
Directly check for username in RealmActivity
Only set the HttpManager after login was successful

Improve error message when oc news is too old

See #7
Add method to check for existing credentials
Remove color field from Feed, it was never used
Use default drag margin for drawers
Add Runnable tag to Account settings drawer item
Move logged in check to ListActivity
Only sync if marking items was successful
stop SyncService when marking changes failed, remove startIds
Bump version code and update CHANGELOG.md for 0.7
